title: Introduction to REST API Testing
body: REST API testing is essential for ensuring the reliability and functionality of your API endpoints. This post explores the fundamentals of API testing and best practices.

title: Using REST Assured for API Testing
body: REST Assured is a powerful Java library for testing RESTful APIs. It provides a simple DSL for creating and verifying API requests and responses.

title: API Test Automation Best Practices
body: Automating API tests can significantly improve the efficiency of your testing process. This post discusses best practices for implementing API test automation.

title: JSON Schema Validation in API Testing
body: Validating the structure of API responses is crucial for ensuring API contract compliance. JSON Schema is a powerful tool for validating JSON responses.

title: API Performance Testing Strategies
body: Performance testing is essential for ensuring your API can handle the expected load. This post discusses strategies for effective API performance testing.
